description: Nichole Pratt is jailed for more than seven years after admitting sex offences against two children.
title: Leominster woman jailed after filming herself abusing children
title_page: Leominster woman jailed after filming herself abusing children - BBC News
maintext:
A woman who made videos of herself abusing two children has been jailed for more than seven years.
Nichole Pratt, 25, initially denied the offences but later pleaded guilty to causing or inciting a child to engage in sexual activity and two counts of child sexual assault.
Pratt's abuse came to light after police received an anonymous tip-off, Hereford Crown Court heard.
The Crown Prosecution (CPS) described the case against Pratt, of Foster Crescent, Leominster, as "truly harrowing and disturbing".
